name: mapreduce.jobhistory.datestring.cache.size
description:
Size of the date string cache. Effects the number of directories
  which will be scanned to find a job.

name: dfs.image.parallel.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when dfs.image.parallel.load is
        enabled. This setting should be less than
        dfs.image.parallel.target.sections. The optimal number of
        threads will depend on the hardware and environment.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.port
description:
Default port that the ShuffleHandler will run on. ShuffleHandler
   is a service run at the NodeManager to facilitate transfers of intermediate
   Map outputs to requesting Reducers.

name: dfs.client.block.write.retries
description:
The number of retries for writing blocks to the data nodes, 
  before we signal failure to the application.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
description:
Support 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. To enable this feature, set the parameter
    to a positive number. The threadpool size is how many threads to dedicate
    to the running of these 'hedged', concurrent reads in your client.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.load.retries
description:
The number of retries on the Datanode to load the provided aliasmap;
      defaults to 0.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.size
description:
Total size in bytes of Datanode blocks to get when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client-am.ipc.max-retries-on-timeouts
description:
The number of client retries on socket timeouts to the AM - before
    reconnecting to the RM to fetch Application Status.
    In other words, it is the ipc.client.connect.max.retries.on.timeouts to be used during
    reconnecting to the RM and fetching Application Status.
